wo-135-1-infra.instruction: Implement the ConfigFactory and establish the test infrastructure (Golden Samples, Parity Test) as per design/work_orders/WO-135.1-Infrastructure.md. Mandatory: 1) Create simulation/utils/config_factory.py, 2) Create tests/utils/test_config_factory.py, 3) Create tests/test_config_parity.py, 4) Update/Harvest Golden Samples via scripts/fixture_harvester.py. Strictly follow the No Mock-Magic rule.
wo-135-1-infra.title: WO-135.1: Config Factory & Test Infrastructure

wo-135-split-remainder.instruction: Generate the remaining work orders for the Abstraction Wall Reboot: WO-135.2 (DTO Schema Alignment in api.py), WO-135.3 (Core Agent/Engine Refactor), and WO-135.4 (Purity Gate v2 Enforcement). Ensure they follow the sequential order and refer to WO-135.1 and PROTOCOL_ENGINEERING.md. Output each to separate files in design/work_orders/.
